text: The St. Croix River Hounds are a planned collegiate summer baseball team scheduled to begin playing in the Northwoods League with the 2021 baseball season. The team ownership group includes former Major League Baseball players Tom Quinlan and Robb Quinlan. It was first reported in July 2017 that the team could begin play in the 2018 season. In October 2017, that slipped to 2019; in October 2018, to 2020; and in October 2019, to 2021. ==References== ==External links== * St. Croix River Hounds website * Northwoods League website Category:Northwoods League teams Category:Sports in Eau Claire, Wisconsin Category:Amateur baseball teams in Wisconsin Category:Tourist attractions in St. Croix County, Wisconsin Category:2017 establishments in Wisconsin
title: St. Croix River Hounds
